apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: shippingservice
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: shippingservice
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: shippingservice
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: server
        image: shippingservice:stable
        ports:
        - containerPort: 50051
        env:
        - name: PORT
          value: '50051'
        readinessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/grpc_health_probe
            - -addr=:50051
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/grpc_health_probe
            - -addr=:50051
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: strimzi-user-operator
  labels:
    app: strimzi
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: strimzi-user-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: strimzi-user-operator
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: strimzi-user-operator
      containers:
      - name: strimzi-user-operator
        image: quay.io/strimzi/operator:0.25.0
        args:
        - /opt/strimzi/bin/user_operator_run.sh
        env:
        - name: STRIMZI_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: STRIMZI_LABELS
          value: strimzi.io/cluster=my-cluster
        - name: STRIMZI_CA_CERT_NAME
          value: my-cluster-clients-ca-cert
        - name: STRIMZI_CA_KEY_NAME
          value: my-cluster-clients-ca
        - name: STRIMZI_FULL_RECONCILIATION_INTERVAL_MS
          value: '120000'
        - name: STRIMZI_LOG_LEVEL
          value: INFO
        - name: STRIMZI_GC_LOG_ENABLED
          value: 'true'
        - name: STRIMZI_CA_VALIDITY
          value: '365'
        - name: STRIMZI_CA_RENEWAL
          value: '30'
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthy
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 100m
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: sistema-noticias-statefulset
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sistema-noticias
  template:
    metadata:
      name: sistema-noticias
      labels:
        app: sistema-noticias
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: sistema-noticias
        image: aluracursos/sistema-noticias:1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: sistema-noticias-config-map
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html/uploads
          name: imagens-pvc
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: sessao-pvc
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: imagens-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: imagens-pvc
      - name: sessao-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: sessao-pvc

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  namespace: default
  name: micro-api
  labels:
    micro: runtime
    name: micro-api
  annotations:
    name: go.micro.api
    version: latest
    source: github.com/xinhari/hari
    owner: micro
    group: micro
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: micro-api
      micro: runtime
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: micro-api
        micro: runtime
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: api
        env:
        - name: MICRO_AUTH
          value: service
        - name: MICRO_AUTH_PUBLIC_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: micro-keypair
              key: public
        - name: MICRO_API_NAMESPACE
          value: domain
        - name: MICRO_ENABLE_STATS
          value: 'true'
        - name: MICRO_BROKER
          value: nats
        - name: MICRO_BROKER_ADDRESS
          value: nats-cluster
        - name: MICRO_REGISTRY
          value: etcd
        - name: MICRO_REGISTRY_ADDRESS
          value: etcd-cluster-client
        - name: MICRO_REGISTER_TTL
          value: '60'
        - name: MICRO_REGISTER_INTERVAL
          value: '30'
        - name: MICRO_ENABLE_ACME
          value: 'true'
        - name: MICRO_ACME_PROVIDER
          value: certmagic
        - name: MICRO_ACME_HOSTS
          value: '*.micro.mu,*.cloud.micro.mu,micro.mu'
        - name: MICRO_STORE
          value: service
        - name: MICRO_STORE_DATABASE
          value: micro
        - name: MICRO_STORE_TABLE
          value: micro
        - name: CF_API_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: CF_API_TOKEN
              name: cloudflare-credentials
        args:
        - api
        image: agus7fauzi/hari:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
          name: api-port
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: image-downloader
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: image-downloader
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: image-downloader
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: python-predictor-cpu
        image: $CORTEX_IMAGE_PYTHON_PREDICTOR_CPU:stable
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        args:
        - -c
        - sleep 1000000
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
